data.name: 0003 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Without resisting the allure of sleep, I close my eyes

data.name: 0005 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The very moment I had mustered up that determination in my half asleep mind

data.name: 0009 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi's yell cleared my drowsiness in one fell swoop

data.name: 0011 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Where are you right now?!

data.name: 0013 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Come to the train station right away That's an order!

data.name: 0016 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I didn't even sleep 2 hours To put it clearly, I'm tired

data.name: 0006 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Uh……who is that……

data.name: 0010 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……Haruhi?

data.name: 0012 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wh… what……

data.name: 0014 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Uhh……it's hot……

data.name: 0017 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not to mention the relentless summer sun blazing down on me……

data.name: 0018 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why am I even following her orders so dutifully?

data.name: 0020 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How about I stop by the convenience store and pick up a cold soda on the way home?

data.name: 0021 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Yeah, that sounds good. Let's do that

data.name: 0022 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ……ah

data.name: 0023 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Whilst I wonder such things to myself——

data.name: 0025 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, you're here early

data.name: 0026 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ……grr

data.name: 0027 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Wait, why the glare?

data.name: 0028 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're late, Kyon!

data.name: 0029 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……What about the others?

data.name: 0030 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's going on with you suddenly calling me out here?

data.name: 0033 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If my memory serves me right, I don't think we ever decided on a time

data.name: 0034 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly!

data.name: 0035 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's exactly why I went out of my way to call you out here You should be grateful

data.name: 0036 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What on Earth should I be grateful for? I don't get it at all.

data.name: 0038 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What are you saying this time? Are you going to make me lunch?

data.name: 0040 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You forgot that too?

data.name: 0041 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: After all, we didn't experience any unnatural phenomenon

data.name: 0042 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So, it wouldn't really be satisfactory is an SOS brigade activity

data.name: 0043 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So, now we're going to go searching through town

data.name: 0044 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait wait wait, I have so many questions before we do any of that

data.name: 0045 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Alright, ask away.

data.name: 0046 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: First of all, why am I the only one here?

data.name: 0047 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Everyone else will come later of course

data.name: 0050 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm pretty sure I was working hard until the morning as well

data.name: 0048 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Since they worked hard until the morning

data.name: 0053 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What sort of an argument is that If you're ever going to be lost for words, now is the time

data.name: 0054 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……So, why in the middle of the day?

data.name: 0055 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Unnatural phenomenon happen at night, right?

data.name: 0056 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Right, at least leave it until the evening

data.name: 0057 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You should've let me sleep, damn it

data.name: 0058 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: According to who?

data.name: 0060 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: More absurd reasoning huh

data.name: 0061 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's hard to accept, but when you really think about it…… yep it's impossible to be satisfied with reasoning like that

data.name: 0062 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't just complain all the time Let's go, Kyon!

data.name: 0052 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You'll be fine

data.name: 0064 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Firstly, let's go to a Café until the others arrive and have a strategy meeting

data.name: 0065 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When on Earth are you planning for the others to arrive?

data.name: 0067 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Surely this won't be an extension of that dreadful training camp, right?

data.name: 0068 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh yeah, I forgot to mention

data.name: 0069 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As she said so, Haruhi stopped in her tracks as if she remembered something

data.name: 0071 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ……What kind of cruel punishment is this

data.name: 0073 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief…

data.name: 0002 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As soon as I get home I fall into bed

data.name: 0004 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even if a spear or an asteroid falls on me I won't get up

data.name: 0015 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After hearing Haruhi's call, I hurried to the station

data.name: 0019 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I want to go home. I want to turn around, jump on my bike and pedal home.

data.name: 0024 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I approach the station and meet eyes with Haruhi waiting there

data.name: 0031 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I told you didn't I? I said "We're meeting up later at the station"

data.name: 0032 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I have a feeling she said something like that, but……

data.name: 0037 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're going to continue our training camp! Isn't it obvious?

data.name: 0039 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Unfortunately, I'm more tired than hungry In fact, I want to go to bed ASAP

data.name: 0049 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I thought I'd let them sleep a little longer

data.name: 0051 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Give me a proper explanation for why I've been called out here before anyone else.

data.name: 0059 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Whether day or night, things happen when they happen!

data.name: 0063 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, wait, I haven't finished with my questions!?

data.name: 0066 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The thing that worries me more than anything else is how Haruhi never gives up.

data.name: 0070 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You were late, so you're paying of course!

data.name: 0072 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seeing Haruhi's triumphant expression I couldn't help but sigh

data.name: 0008 (353.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon!

data.name: 0007 (353.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yes……Hello?

data.name: 0001 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We all returned home.

data.name: 0000 (353.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After a long day, the SOS Brigade's training camp was over.
